thread.title: Lisa K.
thread.title_full: Bes'Dam Soup reviewed by Lisa K.

author: Lisa K.
title: Lisa K.
text: Had a little trouble with shipping at holiday time but I can't really blame it on the company .. Shipper might have been the problem I don't know- but 'besdamsoup certainly corrected the problem by sending me a whole new order, and the lovely woman on the phone I spoke with several times, so apologetic and helpful. I told her that the mushroom soup I serve at Christmas is never totally gone out of the pot...but this year it was ğŸ‘ğŸ»ğŸ‘ğŸ˜ƒ!! My guests thoroughly enjoyed it. Lobster bisque awesome! I now have several other soups in my freezer ready to try.
